name: classes
description: Classes to add to the header container.

name: headingElement
description: Selector of element that should be set to page title.

name: notFound
description: Content displayed when no matching guide for the current hash.

params.name: heading
params.description: The title displayed when no matching guide for the current hash

params.name: html
params.description: HTML content displayed no matching guide for the current hash

name: items
description: Option to show the icon only (with no text).

params.name: heading
params.description: The title of the guide item

params.name: id
params.description: ID of the guide item used to show/hide from href
